content: Delete this. I would delete it for you if I could. I HATE HATE HATE Drake
I love barking to this playlist late into the night. woof
Kylie Minogue invented disco in 2020 with her hit album 'Disco!' My favorite song is Fine Wine off the deluxe edition
Mimi is a queen. She should be on every playlist
wow! - adele (it's adele by the way)
